subject: Creative Suite 3 Design Premium
body:
Heaven has no rage like love to hatred turned, Nor hell a fury like a woman scorned.

The rest, called literature, is a dossier of human imbecility for the guidance of future professors.

Everyone is trying to accomplish something big, not realizing that life is made up of little things.

Don't ask me who's influenced me. A lion is made up of the lambs he's digested, and I've been reading all my life.

The most important function of the university in an age of reason is to protect reason from itself.

I never lost a game. I just ran our of time.

This is the great fault of wine it first trips up the feet: it is a cunning wrestler.

Don't borrow money from a neighbor or a friend, but of a stranger where, paying for it you shall hear of it no more.

Happiness can exist only in acceptance.

Why do you have to a nonconformist like everybody else?

The more defects a man may have, the older he is, the less lovable, the more resounding his success.

Friendship makes prosperity brighter, while it lightens adversity by sharing its grieves and anxieties.

How shall I lose the sin, yet keep the sense, and love the offender, yet detest the offence?
